text: Paris Jackson is confident in her body - - and thinks others should be too. The 19 - year - old model took to Instagram on Friday to share a pic of herself hanging out topless on her balcony, revealing that she thinks ` ` being naked is part of what makes us human.'' WATCH : Paris Jackson Is'Focusing on Her Film and Modeling Career'With New Dark Comedy Role'' I'll say it again for those questioning what I stand for and how I express myself. Nudity started as a movement for'going back to nature ','expressing freedom ','being healthier'and was even called a philosophy. Being naked is part of what makes us human,'' Jackson wrote. ` ` For me, it helps me feel more connected to mama
